controllers

Class DischargePatientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.DischargePatientController

  • @PUBLICAPI
public class DischargePatientController
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this controller to discharge a patient from the hospital.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DischargePatientController(LoginController lc, ConsultPatientFileController cpfc)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dischargePatient()
      Discharges the patient whose file is currently opened.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DischargePatientController

        @PUBLICAPI
public DischargePatientController(LoginController lc,
                                    ConsultPatientFileController cpfc)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        lc - The login controller of the user that wants to discharge a patient from this hospital.
        cpfc - The consult patient file controller of the user that wants to discharge a patient from this hospital.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidLoginControllerException - If the user to whom the given login controller belongs to is not a doctor or is invalid in any other way.
        exceptions.InvalidConsultPatientFileController - If the given consult patient file controller is invalid in any way.
        exceptions.InvalidPatientFileException - If the patient of the patient file that is stored in the consult patient file controller is already discharged.
        exceptions.InvalidHospitalException
        See Also:
        HospitalController, NeedsLoginAndPatientFileController

    • Method Detail

      • dischargePatient

        @PUBLICAPI
public void dischargePatient()
        Discharges the patient whose file is currently opened.
        Throws:
        exceptions.DischargePatientException - If the patient file that is currently open cannot be discharged for any reason (open treatments etc...)
